rphylopic 0.3.3.91
  • Reference

Reference

All functions

add_phylopic()

Input an image and create a ggplot2 layer to add to an existing plot

add_phylopic_base()

Input an image and add to an existing plot made with base graphics

gather_images()

Gather 1 valid image per species

get_names()

Get names for uuids.

image_get() image_list() image_timerange() image_count() image_data()

Perform actions with images.

name_get() name_images() name_minsuptaxa() name_search() name_taxonomy() name_taxonomy_many() name_taxonomy_sources()

Perform actions with names.

nameset_get() nameset_taxonomy()

Perform actions with name sets

recolor_phylopic()

Recolor a phylopic image

rphylopic

rphylopic

save_png()

Save an image to disk as a .png file

search_images()

Search for images for a taxon (via its uuid)

search_text()

Text search for uuids

theme_phylo_blank2()

Fixed phylogeny blank theme for ggphylo

ubio_get()

Perform actions with uBio data.
